text: i khur'anilakatte, itin mumpulla vedattilakatte nannal visvasikkunnate alla enn satyanisedhikal parannu. (nabiye,) i akramikal tannalute raksitavinre atukkal nirttappetunna sandarbham ni kantirunnenkil! avaril orea vibhagavum maruvibhagattinre mel kurram areapicc keantirikkum. balahinarayi ganikkappettavar valuppam naticcirunnavareat parayum: ninnalillayirunnenkil nannal visvasikalayirunnene
